title: Non high contrast themes
author: Apollon-Theos
body_snippet:
White (or light-gray) background with blue background active panel and active tab.

## Expected Behavior
In v 1.76.20 gray/light-gray palette very "same color", active panel/tab with bold font. Not better choice.
White/blue also not better. 

## Current Behavior
Color themes from different version of Visual Studio.

## Possible Solution
Copy palette from any program, that can used long-long time without broken eyes.

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Only look at program
2.
3.
...

comments.author: Apollon-Theos
comments.snippet:
Some themes not editable.
If theme can be edited, color sample needed "refresh" by move mouse over column, without any click.

comments.author: Apollon-Theos
comments.snippet:
Themes stored in 3 folder (!). 
{mRemoteNG folder}\Themes
{mRemoteNG folder}\Resources\Themes
{userProfile}\AppData\Roaming\mRemoteNG\Themes

Maybe need more folder?
